content: I'm looking for some advice on upgrading my Nissan GT-R's suspension. I've recently installed a new set of coilovers, but I'm not sure if I need to make any further adjustments to get the most out of them. By the way, I've been practicing my drift skills at a local parking lot, where I met a few other car enthusiasts, including Alex, who gave me some valuable tips on how to control my speed and angle during turns.
